author: dreid
msg: Big change to the memory test.  We now do a number of allocations of
various sizes and time how long they take.  This is still a work
in progress but is a reasonable start.  Multi-threaded test is needed
if anyone wants to do that before I get there :)

author: dreid
msg: Update the blocks sms to deal with unlimited allocations.

author: dougm
msg: make termination of apr_pstrcat-ed string a bit faster (from jeff trawick)

author: dreid
msg: Add a macro to allow us to time how long a function takes.

author: dreid
msg: It's not an error if we don't have a free function.
